name: C-N-C: Conquer the Nightmare City
description:
Ruchuan Ji   |    Lab 2 1. Click a turret    2. Click a Node    3. Build it! Game documentation

CNC is a tower defense game. The game was made in about 60-70 hours.

The highlight of this game is that players can freely place and upgrade their turrets. The total game play time is about 10-20 minutes.

What's more, the hitfeel in this game is not bad.

Hope you enjoy ;)
